overview.title: Project: Revibelize
overview.description: A student project made for the course Group Projects at DAE.

generalInfo.duration: Half a semester. 40 hours of work per week.

description.title: What is it?
description.content: This project was made during the Group Projects course at DAE. It was made for their research branch, named DAE Research. The goal was to make a mixed reality game, using the Azure Kinect, that would invite people to dance together and have a brief musical experience.

description.title: My Role
description.content: I was one of three programmers. I focused on the gameplay aspects, as well as all integration of the Azure Kinect interactions.
